mapper.select: SELECT M.MENUID,M.SIKNO,M.MENULIST,M.MENUDATE,M.MENUFILESRC,S.SIKNAME FROM MENU M INNER JOIN SIKDANG S ON M.SIKNO=S.SIKNO
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENULIST=#{menuList, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUDATE=#{menuDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MENUFILESRC=#{menuFileSrc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MENUID=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select * from menu where sikno = #{param1} and menudate = #{param2}
